trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class for button fields, such as the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som abstract basisklasse for knappen feltene som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The ButtonFieldBase class provides the methods and properties that are common to all button fields.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ButtonFieldBase inneholder metoder og egenskaper som er felles for alle felt for knappen.

trans-unit.source: The ButtonFieldBase class is the abstract base class for button fields and contains the methods and properties that are common to all button fields.
trans-unit.target: ButtonFieldBase klassen er abstrakt basisklasse for knappen felt og inneholder metoder og egenskaper som er felles for alle felt for knappen.

trans-unit.source: Because this class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of it directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne klassen er abstrakt, kan du opprette en forekomst av den direkte.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must create an instance of a non-abstract class that inherits from the ButtonFieldBase class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> class.
trans-unit.target: I stedet må du opprette en forekomst av en ikke-abstrakte klassen som arver fra klassen ButtonFieldBase, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: An object that is derived from the ButtonFieldBase is used by data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls) to display one or more buttons for each record that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er avledet av ButtonFieldBase brukes av databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>Kontroller) til å vise en eller flere knappene for hver post vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A button field is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: Knappen vises et felt forskjellig avhengig databundet kontrollen den brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a button field as a column, whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>viser kontrollen for felt som en kolonne, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser som en rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Clicking a button in a button field raises the command event of the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer knappen i et felt for hendelsen kommandoen for den overordnede databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can provide a custom routine to perform when a button is clicked by providing an event handler for the command event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en egendefinert rutine skal utføres når brukeren klikker en knapp ved å angi en hendelsesbehandling for kommandoen-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event, whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>hendelse, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To specify the type of button to display, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi hvilken type for å vise, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the header section of a ButtonFieldBase object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise eller skjule topptekst-delen av et ButtonFieldBase-objekt, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) kan vise eller skjule bare delen hele topp kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual button field.
trans-unit.target: Disse databundet kontroller støtter ikke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen for et enkelt knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the `ShowHeader` property for the control.
trans-unit.target: Vis eller Skjul delen hele overskrift for en databundet kontroll (hvis tilgjengelig), bruker du `ShowHeader` egenskap for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> class is an abstract class, you cannot create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> object directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>klassen er en abstrakt klasse, du kan ikke opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>objekt direkte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button type to display in the button field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir knappen som vises i knappefeltet.

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonType property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ButtonType som angir hvilken type knapp skal vises i et felt for knappen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelig for typene.

trans-unit.source: |Button type value|Displays as| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A button control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A button with an image.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A link.| The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: | Knappen typeverdi | Viser som | |-----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En knappekontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En knapp med et bilde. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En kobling. | Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value for the ButtonType property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen ButtonType er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when a button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringen utføres når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref> objekt klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsgrupper kan du tilordne validering Kontroller på en side til en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: Hver valideringsgruppe kan valideres uavhengig av andre valideringsgrupper på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>til å angi navnet på valideringsgruppen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>objektet får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A> property has an effect only when the value of the CausesValidation property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen har en effekt når verdien for egenskapen CausesValidation er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A> property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen bare validering kontrollene som er en del av den angitte gruppen er godkjent når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>poster tilbake til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A> property and the CausesValidation property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen og CausesValidation-egenskapen er satt til `true`, alle kontroller for validering på siden som ikke er tilordnet til en valideringsgruppe er godkjent når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>poster tilbake til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform validation when a button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref> is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre validering når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref> er klikket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current object that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref> class to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Kopier egenskapene for gjeldende objekt som er avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref> klassen til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current object that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> class to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CopyProperties er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å kopiere egenskaper for det gjeldende objektet som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>klasse til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objekt som er sendt av `newField` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to which to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> du vil kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header section is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om toppteksten vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowHeader property to show or hide the header section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowHeader-egenskapen til å vise eller skjule delen topptekst i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>

trans-unit.source: To show the header section, set the ShowHeader property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise toppteksten for egenskapen ShowHeader til `true`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) kan vise eller skjule bare delen hele topp kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the ShowHeader property for an individual button field.
trans-unit.target: Disse databundet kontrollene støtter ikke ShowHeader-egenskapen for et enkelt knapp.

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the `ShowHeader` property for the control.
trans-unit.target: Vis eller Skjul delen hele overskrift for en databundet kontroll (hvis tilgjengelig), bruker du `ShowHeader` egenskap for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the header section; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis toppteksten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the group of validation controls to validate when a button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på gruppen for validering å bekrefte når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref> objekt klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the validation group to validate when a button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ValidationGroup til å angi hvilken validering til å validere når en knapp i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>objekt klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>

trans-unit.source: Only the validation controls in the specified validation group are validated.
trans-unit.target: Bare kontroller validering i valideringsgruppen angitt valideres.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.CausesValidation%2A> property must be set to `true` for the ValidationGroup property to have an effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen må være satt til `true` for egenskapen ValidationGroup har en effekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on validation groups, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om valideringsgrupper, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the validation group to validate when a button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på valideringsgruppen til å validere når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ValidationGroup property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at ValidationGroup-egenskapen ikke er angitt.
